attrs.script:
$userpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{URL_PASSWORD}@@"
$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential("@@{URL_USERNAME}@@",$userpassword)

$FileName = Split-Path @@{EXE_FILE_URL}@@ -Leaf
$ISSFilename = Split-Path @@{ISS_FILE_URL}@@ -Leaf

$Destination = "@@{DOWNLOAD_PATH}@@\$($FileName)"
$ISSDestination = "@@{DOWNLOAD_PATH}@@\$($ISSFilename)"

Write-output "Downloading the eGAgent and iss files"
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri @@{EXE_FILE_URL}@@ -OutFile $Destination -Credential $credential 
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri @@{ISS_FILE_URL}@@ -OutFile $ISSDestination -Credential $credential

Write-output "eGAgent and iss files got downloaded"
Write-output "Installing the eGAgent"

Start-Process $Destination -ArgumentList "-a -s /f1${ISSDestination}" -Wait
Write-output "eGAgent installation completed"

$result = Select-String -Path @@{DOWNLOAD_PATH}@@\setup.log -Pattern "RESULTCODE"
Write-Output $result

$FileName = Split-Path @@{EXE_FILE_URL}@@ -Leaf
$Destination = "@@{DOWNLOAD_PATH}@@\$($FileName)"

$userpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{URL_PASSWORD}@@"
$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential("@@{URL_USERNAME}@@",$userpassword)

$Uninstall_Iss_FileName = Split-Path @@{UNINSTALL_ISS_FILE}@@ -Leaf
$Uninstall_ISSDestination = "@@{DOWNLOAD_PATH}@@\$($Uninstall_Iss_FileName)"

Write-output "Downloading the uninstall iss file"
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri @@{UNINSTALL_ISS_FILE}@@ -OutFile $Uninstall_ISSDestination -Credential $credential
Write-output "Uninstall iss files got downloaded"
Write-output "Uninstalling the eGAgent"
Start-Process $Destination -ArgumentList "-a -s /f1${Uninstall_ISSDestination}" -Wait
Write-output "eGAgent uninstallation completed"
